abort.already_configured: Accessory is already configured with this controller.
abort.already_paired: This accessory is already paired to another device. Please reset the accessory and try again.
abort.ignored_model: HomeKit support for this model is blocked as a more feature complete native integration is available.
abort.invalid_config_entry: This device is showing as ready to pair but there is already a conflicting config entry for it in Home Assistant that must first be removed.
abort.no_devices: No unpaired devices could be found

error.authentication_error: Incorrect HomeKit code. Please check it and try again.
error.unable_to_pair: Unable to pair, please try again.
error.unknown_error: Device reported an unknown error. Pairing failed.

pair.description: Enter your HomeKit pairing code to use this accessory
pair.title: Pair with HomeKit Accessory

user.description: Select the device you want to pair with
user.title: Pair with HomeKit Accessory
